√īḍ 'praise'

present: [2.] ī́ṭṭe  ī́ḍate etc.  ī́ḍiṣva   -- [1.] īḍāmahe  īḍhamāna  

perfect: īḍé  īḍire E.+   -- īḍāṃ  cakre  

[aorist: aiḍiṣṭa  īḍiṣyate  īḍitā  ]

verbal: īḍitá V.+  īḍitum  

secondary: passive: īḍyate   -- desiderative: īḍiḍiṣa-   -- causative: aiḍayan  

derivatives: ī́ḍ  ī́ḍya V.+  īḍitavya B.  īḍénya V.B.  īḍitṛ́ AV.  

Only a few sporadic occurrences in the later language.
